name: Intro
commands: By order of the Duke,|at the behest of the Empress herself,|this monastery is to be searched.
Ahem!|Anyone who resists will be punished in full accordance with the law.
That's enough.|Let's cut to the chase, shall we?|We know you're harboring a fugitive.|Hand the girl over and no one has to get hurt.
Well? So eager before, and now you hesitate. A pity.|Sidney?
# Move Sidney and two thugs to Man1
Hey! Tough guy.|Last chance. Anything coming to mind now?
Let this be an example to those who would defy the Empire's might!|Now, hand over the fugitive, or more will end up like this traitor!
It is best to direct your concern elsewhere, Prim.|There's nothing we can do here and now.
Oh...|W-why are they even here?|We're not harboring any fugitives.
Hmmph. The Empire will take any excuse for a fight.|They think they can just walk in here--
Anger is a natural feeling, Ophie.|But now is not the time for anger.|We must make haste. We can stay here no longer--
Hey! There's someone hiding back here!
Colonel... There's a group of them hiding in the back...
What! You idiots! One of them could be the fugitive.|Don't let them get away!
# Pan over to Ophie, Prim, Master Yohn
Don't just stand there! After the rest of them!|I'll handle this one.
You heard the commander! Kill anyone who stands in our way!

name: Turn1
commands: Ophie, let's go! We need to run!

name: Turn2
commands: Hah! You think you're tough enough to take us on, old man?
You are filled with rage, my child. Allow me to release your anger!
My blade sings once again.|It is a pity one so young had to suffer for it.
# An enemy cuts off their escape

name: Turn3
commands: You need to learn your place!
There's nowhere to run.|Give up now and I'll go easy on you.
Never! Out of our way!|Prim, stay behind me!
No! I can fight too!|You stay behind me!

name: Turn4
commands: Imbeciles!|I'll deal with this one myself.
You may find that easier said than done.
O-Ophie! He said not to look back!
Snap out of it!|Just think! What w-would Master Yohn have wanted?
... Damn it!|Come on then. Our master's sacrifice won't be in vain.

name: FightPrimVagnius
commands: P-Please, stop! You have to listen!|We're not harboring any fugitive.
Well, you don't look like the fugitive girl.|But better safe than sorry...

name: FightOphieJules
commands: I hate to shatter your ego,|but this is not the first time I've crossed swords, kid.
But it's gonna be your last.

name: FightSamVagnius
commands: Ah!{br}The leader of the rag-tag Resistance.{w}{clear}I was hoping I'd be the one to finally kill you.
Not talkative I see...|Well no matter....|Your smoking corpse will make a fine trophy at my victory celebration.

name: FightOphieVagnius
commands: Hah! This is the best you Keralans have to offer?|A child?
Pah. Out of my way, boy.

name: FightPrimVagnius
commands: How could you do this... These people are innocent!
Innocence?|Hah. The morals of a child.|I care not for your innocence.|Power. That is all I seek.
Spare me your bleatings and die!

name: FightOphieVagnius
commands: Hmmph! You're not the one I seek!|Out of my way!

name: Escape
commands: not any(unit.team == "player" for unit in game.units if unit.position)

name: DeathPrim
commands: Is this... blood?|Hang on... I'm sure I can...|I can...
I'm sure I can fix this...|I-I c-can...|T-this is too m-much...|I-I have to retreat...

name: DeathAlthea
commands: It seems... I couldn't run... forever...
It seems... my best... was not good enough.
It seems... I couldn't run... forever...
Althea! Fall back!|You never should have been on this battlefield!

name: DeathJoel
commands: Argh...|Sorry captain...|But I have to fall back...

name: DeathEliza
commands: I-I shouldn't have tried...|I-I am too weak...

name: DeathCoyote
commands: Urgh! No wonder they were always afraid...

name: DeathKayla
commands: Hmph, I know when I've been beat.

name: DeathSidney
commands: Huh?! This was supposed to be... easy...

name: DeathBrigham
commands: What... No! I was so close...

name: DeathAnders
commands: What? Blood? This blood?|It's nothing... I will not disappoint...

name: DeathVincent
commands: Oh damn...|I'm in big fucking trouble here...

name: DeathRazia
commands: Hmmph! You've fought well, Keralan...|Not many have... tested my blade and lived...

name: DeathVagnius
commands: Is this... truly the extent of my ambition...?|Urgh...

name: DeathJakin
commands: Proceed, my child, to your ultimate destiny!

name: DeathBoaz
commands: Hah! The hunter becomes the hunted!|You were a worthy opponent! Well done!

name: DeathUlver
commands: No! I am strong! ...The strongest!|I will not go out like a common--|Urgh...

name: DeathMidas
commands: Please... I'll give you everything... all the gold I...

name: DeathTheo
commands: Urgh! There's been a mistake|This wasn't... supposed to happen

name: DeathDrake
commands: Drake, you're wounded... You should fall back...
Urgh... No! I can't leave you here...
I can take care of myself!|I order you to retreat!
Then I am no use to anyone...|I must depart...
I am of no use to anyone in this condition...|I must... fall back...

name: Outro
commands: Kill the traitors. Burn it all.|They will know the Empire does not tolerate dissent!
Sir, um, two of the... uh... monks, well they...|They escaped, sir.
What!! After them, you fool!|One of them could be the fugitive!
What incompetents...|The Duke will not pleased.

name: Intro
commands: ...I just need to... c-catch my breath...
I guess we've made it far enough.|We can rest here for a little.
What do ya spy, lass?|Hmmm...|Wait, those ain't Imperials! Nia, hold your fire!
Quick, get down! Someone's shooting at us!
Hey! You two!|Sorry about that...|My partner here's got a bit of an itchy trigger finger.
Stay down, Prim. It could be a trap.
How can we trust you? Who are you?
We're uh.... rangers.|Yeah, rangers... y'know... protectin' the forest...
Hey, no need for the blade, lad.|We mean you no harm.
Is that who ya'll runnin' from?|Them scum.
Well, I reckon' ya'll could use some help...
I can take them.|I don't need your--
Ophie! Now's not the time for pride!|What would Master Yohn say?
Ah, don't mention it, little lady.|The only good Imperial in my reckonin' is a dead one.|It's no trouble at all.
Hah! Found you little mice!|Now I'm gonna crush you!
Not without goin' through me first!
Boys, looks like we found ourselves another traitor!|Well, bud, we'll show you what happens when you cross the Empire!

name: FightSidneyOphie
commands: Heh! Finally worked up the nerve to fight?|You shoulda kept running, boy!
Oh I'm scared... Heh heh heh!

name: FightSidneyPrim
commands: Caught you! You're not getting away this time, little mouse.
How could you be so cruel?|Our home...
Hah! You've got no home anymore, girly!

name: FightSidney
commands: What! How'd you manage to get past me men?

name: FightBrigham
commands: Hmmph. Fools one and all.|Don't you understand, Kerala is dead!|This is the Empire's realm now.

name: FightRazia
commands: Hmmph. What incompetents.|To the death then...

name: FightMarduk
commands: You think you've won? Hah!|Nobody can defeat me.|You've only fallen deeper into my trap!|Wahahaha!

name: FightJakin
commands: A deadly dance then, spider and fly.

name: FightAdjutant
commands: Insolent pests!|You should be grateful the Empire ever graced your backwoods province.

name: FightUlver
commands: Come then. Test yourself against my strength!

name: FightBoaz
commands: I've slain many, beast and men alike.|You shall not pose any greater challenge.

name: FightVagnius
commands: So everyone else has failed me. No matter.|Nothing can stand in my way! You least of all!

name: FightHarold
commands: You cannot escape!|Bear witness to the Empire's might!

name: FightAnders
commands: You scum chose the wrong caravan to raid.|You're gonna regret crossing paths with ol' Anders here.

name: FightJules
commands: Man, you best back off.|I'm gettin' a little pissed here!

name: FightVincent
commands: You dun' killed Jules!|You killed my b-brother! ARGH!!!

name: KillHarold
commands: Blast!|They've taken the gold and the life of our commanding officer.|Everybody fall back!
We've broken their ranks!|Now's our chance to escape.

name: PartyLose
commands: # Lose game when party size falls below three
You have lost too many members of your party.

commands: # Lose game when party size falls below three
You have lost too many members of your party.
